scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules .next pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm store prune && pnpm install && pnpm generate:importmap && pnpm generate:types
scripts.db:dump: echo '🔒 Pulling from production...' && source .env.production && pg_dump "$POSTGRES_URL" > prod_dump.sql
scripts.db:restore: echo '💾 Restoring to local...' && source .env.local && [[ "$POSTGRES_URL" == *"localhost"* ]] && psql "$POSTGRES_URL" < prod_dump.sql || (echo '⚠️  Error: Not a local database' && exit 1)
scripts.db:sync: echo '🔄 Syncing database...' && pnpm db:dump && pnpm db:restore
scripts.db:reset: echo '🗑️  Resetting local database...' && dropdb brewwwdb && createdb brewwwdb && pnpm db:sync
